java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class PlayBattleCardsDialog
extends CustomDialog

Dialog that allows the playing of Item Cards in a battle.

Constructor Detail

PlayBattleCardsDialog

public PlayBattleCardsDialog(BattlePanel panel,
                             Player p)
Creates a new PlayBattleCardsDialog dialog for when player(s) are fighting a battle.

Parameters:
panel - reference to the Battle Panel for the current battle
p - player who is playing a Card

PlayBattleCardsDialog

public PlayBattleCardsDialog(RunDialog dialog,
                             Player p,
                             MonsterCard pursuer)
Creates a new PlayBattleCardsDialog dialog for when player(s) are currently running away.

Parameters:
dialog - reference to the Run Dialog for the currently running players
p - the player who is playing a Card
pursuer - the monster who is currently pursing the player

playedCard

public boolean playedCard()
                   throws EndGameException
Returns whether or not a card was played.

Returns:
true if a card was played; false otherwise
Throws:
EndGameException - if a player has won the game and it's game over
